Text: This may be a really cool phone, but it's not worth it with T-Mobile.  They have the worst service of any of the major companies.  T- I really regret signing up with T-Mobile, but I'm stuck with them for the next 6 months of the contract.  [s] If you're looking for a new company, don't be fooled by the service plans.  T-Mobile's minute plans are cheaper for a reason.
